portfolio.title: Automated Quiz Maker
portfolio.description: Designed an automatic quiz generator that converts any topic into fill-in-blank questions. Designed to work with Wikipedia, it makes use of popular Natural Language Processing techniques to rank, clean up and generate text.
portfolio.linkText: Sorry, link is no longer available (Heroku is making me pay for it)

portfolio.title: STEM kits
portfolio.description: Prototyped and created educational kits for STEM education. I wrote code and designed electronics for RC cars, portable boombox and weather stations. In addition, I planned and delivered lessons based on these kits.
portfolio.linkText: Curious? You can check out other kits here.

portfolio.title: Forum Website
portfolio.description: Created a forum-like website that allows users to share and commit to 30 days of self-improvement challenges. Created with Laravel & Tailwind CSS
portfolio.linkText: Checkout the code for this project here
